full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA RGYAL BA CAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS BKA' STZAL PA, LAG NA RDO RJE DE'I PHYIR KHYONG KYIS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SNYING PO DANG PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BAR YANG ZUNG ZHIG ,BDUD KYI DKYIL 'KHOR THAMS CAD RNAM PAR 'JOMS PAR BYED PA RGYAL BA CAN ZHES BYA BAR YANG ZUNG ZHIG BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, ,GSANG BA'I BDAG PO LAG NA RDO RJE DANG, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS KYI BU DANG, LHA DANG MI DANG LHA MA YIN DANG DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANG STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA RGYAL BA CAN ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS RDZOGS SO, ,GSUM ZHUS SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
